text: Hey everyone, does anyone have a Abandoned cart Workflow example?
Thanks. I was thinking if they make the purchase for example after the first email. How would they un-enroll from the workflow not to receive additional emails ? <@U03RQLHTW9Z>

You can go into "Settings" of the workflow and define an unenrollment clause, this could be that the deal is no longer in `Abandoned Checkout` and as a result deal is unenrolled from workflow and no more emails will be sent.
Also <https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/9-ways-enhance-your-ecommerce-marketing-automation-using-coldrick/|this> might be worth checking out for more ideas.
oh ok good idea. Thanks so Much!

You could also add a "Delay until event" action and wait a maximum of 2 days. The event would be the deal stage changing to one of those values. By setting that maximum of 2 days to wait you can be sure the workflow will end immediately after the stage changes.
I tried to add unenrollment rules as well. I completed the order I still wasn't un-enrolled from the workflow
Yeah that unenrollment logic is always more confusing to me than the Delay until event action because it's state based vs an actual event happening (the deal literally changing pipelines or stages)
